data.title: Shane Battier, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Shane Battier stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Shane Battier - Points

Shane Battier scores a career high 33 points (2005)

On March 04, 2005, Shane Battier set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 33 points in Memphis's home win against Toronto, 86-75. He also had 6 rebounds, 2 assists, 3 steals and 1 block. He shot 6/12 from two, 4/5 from three, shooting at 58.8% from the field. He also shot 9/11 from the free-throw line.

Shane Battier - Rebounds

Shane Battier grabs a career high 14 rebounds (2003)

On December 22, 2003, Shane Battier tied his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 14 rebounds in Memphis's road loss against Denver, 106-99. He also had 15 points, 4 assists and 2 blocks.

Shane Battier - Assists

Shane Battier gives a career high 8 assists (2001)

On December 18, 2001, Shane Battier set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 8 assists in Memphis's home loss against Milwaukee, 105-114. He also had 19 points, 5 rebounds, 1 steal and 1 block.

Shane Battier - Steals

Shane Battier has a career high 5 steals (2001)

On December 03, 2001, Shane Battier tied his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 5 steals in Memphis's road loss against Orlando, 113-71. He also had 12 points, 3 rebounds and 1 assist.

Shane Battier - Blocks

Shane Battier blocks a career high 7 shots (2010)

On March 03, 2010, Shane Battier set his career high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 7 blocks in Houston's home loss against Sacramento, 81-84. He also had 4 points, 4 rebounds and 2 assists.

Shane Battier - Efficiency

Shane Battier records a career high 38 efficiency rating (2005)

On April 10, 2005, Shane Battier set his career high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 38 efficiency in Memphis's home win against Charlotte, 102-95. He also had 25 points, 11 rebounds and 2 assists.
